create.title: Share secrets without the digital footprint.
create.subtitle: Send passwords, keys, and other sensitive data with a single-use link.

share.title: Done! Just share the link below 🎉
share.subtitle: Send passwords, keys, and other sensitive data with a single-use link.
share.thisLinkWillOnlyBeValid: This link will only be valid for <1>ttl</1>. Once this link is opened or it expires, your secret data will be destroyed from the system.

view.title: Somebody sent you a secret! 🤫
view.subtitle: Click "Open Secret" to view. Be sure to save it somewhere safe - it can only be viewed once!
